text: The Hyundai ix20 is a mini MPV made by Hyundai from 2010 to 2019 it replaced the Hyundai Lavita/Matrix. == History and Features == The Hyundai ix20 was debuted at the Paris Motor Show in 2010 its a rebadged version of the Kia Venga. and the MPV shares its platform with the Hyundai i20 and the Kia Soul it has a 1.4 and 1.6 liter Petrol engines and a 1.4 and a 1.6 liter Diesel engines and the ix20 has a 5-speed and 6-speed manual transmission and a 4-speed automatic transmission. == Markets == The Hyundai ix20 was sold exclusively in Europe in all its production period. == Discontinuation == The production of the Hyundai ix20 ended in 2019 this was mainly due to the popularity of compact SUVs and weak sales. == References == Category:2010s automobiles ix20 Category:Minivans
title: Hyundai ix20
